verses.verse: A songe of the steares of Dauid. I Was glad, when they sayde vnto me: we will go into the house of the Lord.
Our fete shall stande in thy gates, O Ierusalem.
Ierusalem is buylded as a cytie, that is at vnite in it selfe.
For thyther the trybes go vp, euen the trybes of the Lorde: to testifye vnto Israel, to geue thanckes vnto the name of the Lorde.
For there is the seate of iudgement, euen the seate of the house of Dauid.
O praye for the peace of Ierusalem: they shall prospere that loue the.
Peace be within thy walles, and plenteousnes wythin thy palaces.
For my brethren and companions sakes, I wyll wyshe the prosperite.
Yee, because of the house of the Lorde oure God, I wyll seke to do the good.
